description:
Secure remote access and support

TeamViewer is a comprehensive, remote access, remote control and remote support solution that works with almost every desktop and mobile platform, including Windows, macOS, Android, and iOS.
TeamViewer lets you remote in to computers or mobile devices located anywhere in the world and use them as though you were there.
New Features
- Clipboard synchronization can now be enabled or disabled directly from the end users TeamViewer panel during a remote control session.
- PDF export format has been added to Endpoint Protection reports for Detections, Endpoints, Events, and Quarantine.
- Automatic recording of incoming TeamViewer sessions to managed devices can now be enabled through policy settings, providing improved auditability.

Improvements
- The TeamViewer Remote UI now reflects the correct license context when transitioning from Tensor to Remote Worker license.
- A new File Format column has been added to the Endpoint Protection reporting table, indicating whether the export format is CSV or PDF.
- Deprecated Endpoint Protection reports that are no longer supported have been removed.
- Action buttons in the Active Insights side panel now respond dynamically to width changes, automatically transitioning to the three-dot overflow menu when space is limited.

Bugfixes
- Fixed a bug where the cursor jumped to the beginning of the text when a message was received during typing in the in-session chat box.
- Security enhancement for symbolic linking. (TV Security Bulletin TV-2025-1004).
